member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Contract '{0}' is not implemented by type '{1}'..

member.name: P:LightCore.Properties.Resources.InvalidRegistrationFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Registration to self failed, type '{0}' seems to be not concrete..

member.name: P:LightCore.Properties.Resources.NoConstructorAvailableForType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No constructor available for type '{0}'. Please add a public constructor..

member.name: P:LightCore.Properties.Resources.NoSuitableConstructorFoundFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No suitable constructor for implementation '{0}' found. Check registered dependencies and availability of default constructors..

member.name: P:LightCore.Properties.Resources.PassedTypeDoesNotImplementILifecycleFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Passed type '{0}' does not implement the interface "ILifecycle"..

member.name: P:LightCore.Properties.Resources.RegistrationNotFoundFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Registration for contract '{0}' not found, please check your registrations..
